original_text:
“Who is it he is trying to teach?
    To whom is he explaining his message?
To children weaned from their milk,
    to those just taken from the breast?
korean_text: 그들이 이르기를 그가 누구에게 지식을 가르치며 누구에게 도를 전하여 깨닫게 하려는가 젖 떨어져 품을 떠난 자들에게 하려는가

sentences.original_text: Who is it he is trying to teach?
To whom is he explaining his message?
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그의 메시지를 설명하는 사람은 누구인가?

sentences.original_text: To children weaned from their milk,
to those just taken from the breast?
